mapper.insert: insert knowledge_planet.planet(p_name, create_time,max_number, p_description, p_avatar, hot) values(#{planetName},#{createTime},#{maxNumber},#{planetDescription},#{planetAvatar},#{hot});
mapper.select: select p_code , p_name ,create_time ,max_number,p_description , p_avatar ,hot from knowledge_planet.planet order by hot desc limit 5;
select * from knowledge_planet.planet where p_name like #{bindInfo} or p_description like #{bindInfo};
select count(u_id) from knowledge_planet.user_planet_rel where p_code =#{p_code};

select u.u_id as userId,integral,u_name as userName,avatar from knowledge_planet.user_planet_rel upl,knowledge_planet.user u where p_code=#{planetCode} and upl.u_id=u.u_id order by integral desc limit 50;
mapper.delete: delete from knowledge_planet.user_planet_rel where u_id = #{userId} and p_code =#{planetCode};
